headline: A Fresh Look at Entergy (ETR) Valuation as Shares Rally to New Highs
summary: Entergy (ETR) has shown strong momentum lately, with shares climbing nearly 9% over the past month and 11% in the past 3 months. Investors are taking notice as the utility operator’s steady performance stands out in the sector. See our latest analysis for Entergy. Momentum has really picked up for Entergy this year. After a strong recent run, the company now sports a year-to-date share price return of 27%, and its total shareholder return tops 45% over the past year. This performance reflects...
